name: Nightmare Nursery
description:
NIGHTMARE NURSERY
🌱🔪

I told a witch she should smile more - so she cursed me!
Now any plant I grow in my nursery turns EVIL!!!

Evil plants don’t sell well, their price falls rapidly.
But if I can sell them quickly after they turn,
then I can still make a nice PROFIT!!! 

BUY SEEDS + LET THEM GROW
SELL PLANTS QUICKLY WHEN THEY TURN EVIL
